name: ax-1rid
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0))
comment: ` 1 ` is an identity element for real multiplication. Axiom 14 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ ax1rid . Weakened from the original axiom in the form of statement in ~ mulid1 , based on ideas by Eric Schmidt. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-1995.)
